title: Energy Fields SFX Pack
description: Energy Fields SFX Pack is the ultimate collection of buzzing sounds for your sci-fi game or film project
longDescription:
If you need custom-designed SFX or music, please drop a note to at.monitor.lizards@gmail.com


Energy Fields SFX Pack is the ultimate collection of more than 100 buzzing sounds which are perfect for creating a sci-fi atmosphere with energy and force fields, generators, plasma, electrical magic, and other futuristic devices.

In addition to the ambience sounds, the pack also includes a set of short, sharp UI sounds suitable for touch panels or mechanical switches to enhance the user experience of your interface and game objects.

Whether you're creating a video game, a film, or a virtual reality experience, the pack will help to transport your audience to the futuristic world of your imagination.


The full preview is here.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • energy/force fields, plasma ambient loops;
  • industrialÂ generators, electricity buzzing loops;
  • UI sounds for switches and such;


Number of Audio Waves: 103

Number of Audio Cues: 103

Do Sound FX loop: Yes (non-UI ones)

Minutes of audio provided: 23:11

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
